text: Major Harinder Singh was a Punjabi politician who served as Leader of opposition in Punjab assemblypage 158 of Punjab Vidhan Sabha Compendium. Punjab Legislative Assembly. Retrieved on 24 July 2019. (1969-1971) and also served as minister of Revenue and Industry in Giani Gurmukh Singh Musafir's cabinet (1966-1967). He also remained the member of Central Legislative Assembly by winning election in 1945.Historical Constitution ==References== Category:Members of Central Legislative Assembly of India Category:Leaders of the Opposition in Punjab, India Category:1922 births Category:Possibly living people
title: Harinder Singh
